devdoc.author: Taller de programacion 2 - FIUBA - Ayudantes
devdoc.details: This is an academic contract made for didactic purposes. DO NOT USE THIS IN PRODUCTION

deposit().details: it calls an internal function that does this entirely

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.receiver: Address that will receive the payment

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: BasicPayments Contract

deposit().notice: Function to receive payments Emits DepositMade with the sender and the amount as a parameter Fails if value sent is 0

sendPayment(address,uint256).notice: Sends the specified amount to the specified address  Emits PaymentMade with the receiver and the amount as a parameter Fails if value sent is greater than the balance the contract has Fails if not called by the owner

sentPayments(address).notice: Mapping of payments sent to an address

userdoc.notice: This contract allows you to track payments made to it
